tool_description: Collects and analyzes feedback from building users with disabilities about their actual experiences navigating and using the facility.

survey_method.description: Data collection method: in_person, online, phone, focus_group, observation

target_sample_size.description: Desired number of survey responses (minimum 5, maximum 200)

user_groups.description: Target user groups: employees, visitors, customers, students, patients, general_public

survey_language.description: Languages for survey: english, spanish, french, asl, other

error_messages: Invalid building ID: Provide a recognized building identifier from the system.
Unsupported survey method: Choose from available data collection methods.
Sample size out of range: Target sample must be between 5 and 200 participants.
Invalid user group: Use only specified user group categories.
Unsupported language: Choose from available survey languages or specify 'other'.
usage: Configure survey parameters including method, sample size, and target groups. The tool facilitates data collection and provides analysis of user experiences.

survey_id.description: Unique identifier for this user experience survey

response_count.description: Number of completed survey responses received

satisfaction_score.description: Average user satisfaction rating from 1 to 10
